review: This is a very nice product.  Having used Apple TV for so many years, getting used to the different setup on Fire TV took a little time, but very much worth the effort.  I am still exploring some of the features but so far I am quite satisfied.
author: wsteps

review: We just received our Fire TV the other day and so far it works great.  The voice search feature is way beyond anything else I use.  I am somewhat disappointed that many of the movies I'd like to view comes with a price.  Something I didn't expect at all, but then again that isn't a problem with Fire TV is it?  Ha Ha  I will recommend Fire TV to friends.
author: Harry "Harry Johnson"

review: After purchasing Amazon Prime, I found out my two year old Smart TV wasn't so smart.  It didn't have the Prime app. included.  I couldn't take full advantage of the Amazon Prime on my TV.  I was so looking forward to watching all the exciting movies and shows but nothing worked.  I was left with no other choice but to purchase the Amazon Fire TV.  I absolutely love it.  I'm glad I upgraded.  The Voice activation is a plus.
author: Kim
